prompts: Create a unique electric-type Pokemon with a sleek and streamlined design featuring bright colors.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a futuristic creature with dynamic electricity-themed abilities.
Generate a flying electric Pokemon that has a vibrant color palette and an agile appearance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of electricity, with sharp angles and a glowing aura.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, showcasing a blend of technology and nature.
Design an electric-type Pokemon that has a whimsical yet powerful look, perfect for battles.
Show me a Pokemon that has an electrifying presence with stunning colors and distinctive features.
